workflow.name: Auto-extract & approve invoices with OpenAI, Jotform - fraud detection
workflow.description:
Transform accounts payable from a manual bottleneck into an intelligent, automated system that reads invoices, detects fraud, and processes payments automatically‚Äîsaving 20+ hours per week while preventing costly fraudulent payments.

## üéØ What This Workflow Does

Automates the complete invoice-to-payment cycle with advanced AI:

1. **üìß Check Invoices from Jotform** - Monitor Jotform for Invoice Submission
2. **ü§ñ AI-Powered OCR** - Extracts ALL data from PDFs and images (vendor, amounts, line items, dates, tax)
3. **üö® Fraud Detection Engine** - Analyzes 15+ fraud patterns: duplicates, anomalies, suspicious vendors, document quality
4. **üö¶ Intelligent Routing** - Auto-routes based on AI risk assessment:
   - **Critical Fraud (Risk 80-100)**: Block ‚Üí Slack alert ‚Üí CFO investigation
   - **Manager Review (>$5K or Medium Risk)**: Approval workflow with full analysis
   - **Auto-Approve (<$5K + Low Risk)**: Instant ‚Üí QuickBooks ‚Üí Vendor notification
5. **üìä Complete Audit Trail** - Every decision logged to Google Sheets with AI reasoning

## ‚ú® Key Features

### Advanced AI Capabilities
- **Vision-Based OCR**: Reads any invoice format‚ÄîPDF, scanned images, smartphone photos
- **99% Extraction Accuracy**: Vendor details, line items, amounts, dates, tax calculations, payment terms
- **Multi-Dimensional Fraud Detection**:
  - Duplicate invoice identification (same number, similar amounts)
  - Amount anomalies (round numbers, threshold gaming, unusually high)
  - Vendor verification (new vendors, mismatched domains, missing tax IDs)
  - Document quality scoring (OCR confidence, missing fields, calculation errors)
  - Timing anomalies (future dates, expired invoices, weekend submissions)
  - Pattern-based detection (frequent small amounts, vague descriptions, no PO references)

### Intelligent Processing
- **Risk-Based Scoring**: 0-100 risk score with detailed reasoning
- **Vendor Trust Ratings**: Build vendor reputation over time
- **Category Classification**: Auto-categorizes (software, consulting, office supplies, utilities, etc.)
- **Amount Thresholds**: Configurable auto-approve limits
- **Human-in-the-Loop**: Critical decisions escalated appropriately
- **Fast-Track Low Risk**: Process safe invoices in under 60 seconds

### Security & Compliance
- **Fraud Prevention**: Catch fraudulent invoices before payment
- **Duplicate Detection**: Prevent double payments automatically
- **Complete Audit Trail**: Every decision logged with timestamp and reasoning
- **Role-Based Approvals**: Route to correct approver based on amount and risk
- **Document Verification**: Quality checks on every invoice

## üíº Perfect For

- **Finance Teams**: Processing 50-500 invoices per week
- **CFOs**: Need fraud prevention and spending visibility
- **Controllers**: Want automated AP with audit compliance
- **Growing Companies**: Scaling without adding AP headcount
- **Multi-Location Businesses**: Centralized invoice processing across offices
- **Fraud-Conscious Organizations**: Healthcare, legal, financial services, government contractors

## üí∞ ROI & Business Impact

### Time Savings
- **90% reduction** in manual data entry time
- **20-25 hours saved per week** on invoice processing
- **Same-day turnaround** on all legitimate invoices
- **Zero data entry errors** with AI extraction
- **No more lost invoices** - complete tracking

### Fraud Prevention
- **100% duplicate detection** before payment
- **Catch suspicious patterns** automatically
- **Prevent invoice splitting** (gaming approval thresholds)
- **Identify fake vendors** before payment
- **Average savings: $50K-$200K annually** in prevented fraud losses

### Process Improvements
- **24-hour vendor response times** (vs 7-10 days manual)
- **95%+ payment accuracy** with AI validation
- **Better cash flow management** via due date tracking
- **Vendor satisfaction** from transparent, fast processing
- **Audit-ready** with complete decision trail

## üîß Required Integrations

### Core Services
- **Jotform** - Invoice Submissions
*Create your form for free on [Jotform using this link](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=mediajade)*
- **OpenAI API** - GPT-4o-mini for OCR & fraud detection (~$0.03/invoice)
- **Google Sheets** - Invoice database and analytics (free)
- **Accounting System** - QuickBooks, Xero, NetSuite, or Sage (via API)

### Optional Add-Ons
- **Slack** - Real-time fraud alerts and approval requests
- **Bill.com** - Payment processing automation
- **Linear/Asana** - Task creation for manual reviews
- **Expensify/Ramp** - Expense management integration

## üöÄ Quick Setup Guide

### Step 1: Import Template
1. Copy JSON from artifact
2. In n8n: **Workflows** ‚Üí **Import from File** ‚Üí Paste JSON
3. Template imports with all nodes and sticky notes

### Step 2: Configure Email Monitoring
1. Connect Gmail or Outlook account
2. Update filter: invoices@yourcompany.com (or your AP email)
3. Test: Send yourself a sample invoice

### Step 3: Add OpenAI API
1. Get API key: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
2. Add to both AI nodes (OCR + Fraud Detection)
3. Cost: ~$0.03 per invoice processed

### Step 4: Connect Accounting System
1. Get API credentials from QuickBooks/Xero/NetSuite
2. Configure HTTP Request node with your endpoint
3. Map invoice fields to your GL codes

### Step 5: Setup Approval Workflows
1. Update email addresses (finance-manager@yourcompany.com)
2. Configure Slack webhook (optional)
3. Set approval thresholds ($5K default, customize as needed)

### Step 6: Create Google Sheet Database
Create spreadsheet with columns:

workflow.name: Auto-Extract & Approve Invoices with OpenAI, Jotform - Fraud Detection

values.content:
=You are an expert invoice processing AI. Extract ALL information from this invoice document with perfect accuracy.

**Email Context:**
From: {{ $json.email_from }}
Subject: {{ $json.email_subject }}
Date: {{ $json.email_date }}

Analyze the attached invoice image/PDF and extract complete structured information. Return ONLY valid JSON with this exact structure:

{
  "vendor_name": "Company Name",
  "vendor_email": "vendor@email.com",
  "vendor_address": "Full address",
  "vendor_tax_id": "Tax/VAT ID if present",
  "invoice_number": "INV-12345",
  "invoice_date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
  "due_date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
  "po_number": "PO number if referenced",
  "currency": "USD",
  "line_items": [
    {
      "description": "Item description",
      "quantity": 1,
      "unit_price": 100.00,
      "total": 100.00
    }
  ],
  "subtotal": 100.00,
  "tax_amount": 8.00,
  "tax_rate": 8.0,
  "shipping": 0.00,
  "total_amount": 108.00,
  "payment_terms": "Net 30",
  "notes": "Any special notes or terms",
  "bank_details": "Bank account information if present",
  "invoice_category": "software|hardware|services|consulting|office_supplies|utilities|marketing|travel|other",
  "confidence_score": 0.95
}

IMPORTANT:
- Extract exact amounts with 2 decimal places
- Use YYYY-MM-DD format for dates
- If information is missing, use null
- Be extremely accurate with numbers
- Classify invoice into appropriate category
- Confidence score 0-1 based on document clarity

parameters.text:
=You are a financial fraud detection AI with expertise in identifying invoice anomalies, duplicate submissions, and fraudulent patterns.

Analyze this invoice for potential fraud, anomalies, or issues:

## INVOICE DETAILS
**Vendor:** {{ $json.vendor_name }}
**Invoice Number:** {{ $json.invoice_number }}
**Date:** {{ $json.invoice_date }}
**Due Date:** {{ $json.due_date }}
**Amount:** {{ $json.currency }} {{ $json.total_amount }}
**Category:** {{ $json.invoice_category }}
**PO Number:** {{ $json.po_number || 'None' }}
**Email From:** {{ $json.email_from }}

**Line Items:**
{{ $json.line_items.map(item => `- ${item.description}: ${item.quantity} √ó $${item.unit_price} = $${item.total}`).join('\n') }}

**Payment Terms:** {{ $json.payment_terms }}

---

## FRAUD DETECTION CRITERIA

### Red Flags to Check:
1. **Duplicate Invoice Detection**
   - Similar amounts recently processed
   - Same invoice number from this vendor
   - Duplicate line item descriptions

2. **Amount Anomalies**
   - Unusually high amount for vendor/category
   - Round numbers (possible fake invoices)
   - Amount just under approval threshold (splitting)

3. **Vendor Verification**
   - New/unknown vendor
   - Mismatched email domain vs vendor name
   - Missing tax ID or business details
   - Suspicious bank details

4. **Document Quality Issues**
   - Low confidence score from OCR
   - Missing critical information
   - Unprofessional formatting
   - Mismatched totals or calculations

5. **Timing Anomalies**
   - Invoice date in future
   - Very old invoice
   - Due date already passed
   - Weekend/holiday invoice dates

6. **Pattern Detection**
   - Frequent small invoices (just under approval limit)
   - Vague descriptions ("consulting services")
   - No PO number for large amounts
   - Rush payment requests

### Category-Specific Checks:
- **Software/SaaS:** Check if subscription-based, verify renewal dates
- **Consulting:** Verify hourly rates are reasonable
- **Travel:** Check dates align with known business trips
- **Office Supplies:** Verify quantities are reasonable

---

## YOUR ANALYSIS TASK

Provide detailed fraud risk assessment covering:

1. **Overall Risk Level** - critical/high/medium/low with clear reasoning

2. **Specific Red Flags Found** - List all anomalies detected

3. **Vendor Trust Score** - Rate vendor legitimacy (0-100)

4. **Amount Validation** - Is the amount reasonable for this category?

5. **Document Quality Score** - Rate invoice professionalism (0-100)

6. **Duplicate Risk** - Likelihood this is a duplicate submission

7. **Recommended Action** - auto_approve / manager_review / fraud_investigation / reject

8. **Required Verifications** - What should be manually verified

9. **Approval Workflow** - Who should approve based on amount/risk

10. **Priority Level** - urgent / high / normal / low

Be thorough and err on the side of caution. Flag anything suspicious for human review.

parameters.message:
=
üö® CRITICAL FRAUD ALERT üö®

A potentially fraudulent invoice has been detected and requires immediate investigation.

Invoice Information

Vendor: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.vendor_name }}
Invoice Number: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.invoice_number }}
Amount: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.currency }} {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.total_amount }}
Date: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.invoice_date }}
Due Date: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.due_date }}
Category: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.invoice_category }}
PO Number: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.po_number || 'None provided' }}

{{ $json.output.risk_score }}Risk Score
{{ $json.output.vendor_trust_score }}Vendor Trust
{{ $json.output.document_quality_score }}Doc Quality

‚ö†Ô∏è Red Flags Detected

    {{ $json.output.red_flags.map(flag => '
  • ' + flag + '
    • ').join('') }}

Required Verifications:

    {{ $json.output.required_verifications.map(ver => '
  • ' + ver + '
    • ').join('') }}

AI Recommendation:

{{ $json.output.recommended_action.toUpperCase().replace('_', ' ') }}

‚è∞ This invoice has been BLOCKED from payment pending your investigation.

Please review immediately and take appropriate action.

Invoice ID: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.invoice_id }}
Detected: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.parsed_at }}
parameters.subject: =‚ö†Ô∏è URGENT: Suspicious Invoice Requires Investigation - {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.vendor_name }}

parameters.message:
=

üìÑ Invoice Approval Required

{{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.vendor_name }}

Invoice Number: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.invoice_number }}
Date: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.invoice_date }}
Due Date: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.due_date }}
Amount: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.currency }} {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.total_amount }}
Category: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.invoice_category }}
PO #: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.po_number || 'N/A' }}
{{ $json.output.vendor_trust_score }} Vendor Trust Score (Low Risk)

Line Items

{{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.line_items.map(item => '').join('') }}
DescriptionQtyUnit PriceTotal
' + item.description + '' + item.quantity + '$' + item.unit_price.toFixed(2) + '$' + item.total.toFixed(2) + '
Subtotal${{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.subtotal.toFixed(2) }}
Tax ({{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.tax_rate }}%)${{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.tax_amount.toFixed(2) }}
TOTAL${{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.total_amount.toFixed(2) }}

AI Analysis Summary:

Risk Level: {{ $json.output.risk_level.toUpperCase() }}
Recommendation: {{ $json.output.recommended_action.replace('_', ' ').toUpperCase() }}

{{ $json.output.red_flags.length > 0 ? '

‚ö†Ô∏è Items to Verify:

    ' + $json.output.red_flags.map(flag => '
  • ' + flag + '
    • ').join('') + '
' : '

‚úÖ No issues detected

' }}

Payment Terms: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.payment_terms }}

Please approve or reject this invoice.
parameters.subject: =Invoice Approval Required - {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.vendor_name }} - ${{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.total_amount }}

parameters.message:
=

‚úÖ Invoice Approved

Dear {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.vendor_name }},

Thank you for your invoice. We've received and automatically processed it.

Invoice Number: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.invoice_number }}
Amount: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.currency }} {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.total_amount }}
Due Date: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.due_date }}
Status: Approved for Payment

Payment will be processed according to terms: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.payment_terms }}

Expected payment date: {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.due_date }}

If you have questions, please reply to this email.

Best regards,
Accounts Payable
[Your Company]
parameters.subject: =Invoice Received & Processing - {{ $('Parse Invoice Data').item.json.invoice_number }}

parameters.content:
## üìß Smart Invoice Intake

Monitors new invoice submitted via a **Jotform**

Create your form for free on [Jotform using this link](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=mediajade)

**Output:** Invoice attachments ready for AI processing

## ü§ñ AI-Powered OCR & Data Extraction

Uses GPT-4o-mini with vision to read invoices and extract ALL structured data with high accuracy.

**Result:** 95%+ accuracy on invoice data extraction

## üö® AI Fraud Detection & Risk Analysis

Advanced fraud detection AI analyzes every invoice for anomalies, duplicates, and suspicious patterns.

**Result:** Catch fraud before payment, protect company assets

## üö¶ Intelligent Routing & Approval Workflows

Automatically routes invoices based on risk level, amount, and fraud analysis.

**Result:** Fast processing for legitimate invoices, rigorous checks for suspicious ones

## üìä Financial Analytics & Audit Trail

Comprehensive logging of all invoices for analytics, compliance, and audit purposes.

**Result:** Data-driven financial operations with full transparency

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
